holidays.title: National Daisy Day
holidays.description: Just because daisies are a common flower, doesn't mean they aren't a special one.

holidays.title: National Kazoo Day
holidays.description: If you haven’t used a kazoo since elementary school, then get ready to play!

holidays.title: American Immigration Lawyers Association Day of Action
holidays.description: 45 million immigrants who call the U.S. their home, deserve to live in dignity and peace.

holidays.title: Christa McAuliffe Day
holidays.description: Learn how the former gifted teacher, Christa McAuliffe, is inspiring people even to this day.

holidays.title: Data Privacy Day
holidays.description: Data Privacy Day is part of the global online security, and privacy campaign ‘STOP. THINK. CONNECT.’

holidays.title: Global Community Engagement Day
holidays.description: Let’s engage with our communities and learn more about Global Community Engagement Day.

holidays.title: International Reducing CO2 Emissions Day
holidays.description: Let us get ready to play our part in reducing CO2 emissions!

holidays.title: José Martí's Birthday Memorial
holidays.description: On José Martí’s Birthday Memorial, remember the revolutionary writer who sparked the first Cuban revolution.

holidays.title: Julian Felipe Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the birth anniversary of Professor Julian Felipe in recognition of his talent and ingenuity.

holidays.title: Library Shelfie Day
holidays.description: We love libraries, and we love selfies. Put them together, and you’ve got library shelfies!

holidays.title: National Blueberry Pancake Day
holidays.description: Pancakes are great, but pancakes dotted with juicy, nutritious blueberries are even better.

holidays.title: National Pediatrician Day
holidays.description: Join us and check out these fun ideas to celebrate National Pediatrician Day.

holidays.title: Pop Art Day
holidays.description: Get your canvas, pencils, and paints ready to explore the world of creativity.

holidays.title: Rattlesnake Roundup Day
holidays.description: Get your hunting gear ready as we go round up some rattlesnakes!

holidays.title: Thank a Plugin Developer Day
holidays.description: Get ready to show your appreciation for plugin developers this Thank a Plugin Developer Day.

holidays.title: Aka’s Birthday
holidays.description: With every hit song he released, AKA proved everything is possible with talent and hard work.

holidays.title: Anthony Hamilton’s Birthday
holidays.description: Whether Anthony Hamilton’s making solo music or collaborating with other artists, he’s a soul superstar.

holidays.title: Elijah Wood’s Birthday
holidays.description: You’re at the right place to learn the surprising details about this familiar face.

holidays.title: J Cole’s Birthday
holidays.description: J. Cole’s star power is infinite with his earnest lyricism and pure magnetism.

holidays.title: Jeremiah McDonald’s Birthday
holidays.description: 12-year-old Jeremiah McDonald picks up a video cassette recorder and talks about things that matter to him.

holidays.title: Marcus Dobre’s Birthday
holidays.description: A talented dancer and content creator, Marcus Dobre is a trendsetter for this generation’s influencer scene.

holidays.title: Rick Ross’s Birthday
holidays.description: Rick Ross's music career is wrapped around luxury, hard work, and smart work.

holidays.title: That Girl Lay Lay’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented musician, actress, and entrepreneur has nowhere else to go but up.
